entry.title: The 4-Hour Work Week
entry.content:
I have been meaning to read Tim Ferriss’s famous book for millenials for more than a year. If you tend to read certain subreddits (/r/financialindependance, /r/stoicism, etc) then you will see his name come up on book recommendation threads.



Fear of quitting trumps reality

“Sed ut perspiciatis unde omnis iste natus error sit voluptatem accusantium doloremque laudantium, totam rem aperiam, eaque ipsa quae ab illo inventore veritatis et quasi architecto beatae vitae dicta sunt explicabo.
